participant_1.name: Olivia Winters
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about collecting unique items. Has a nostalgic side due to past achievements.
participant_1.background: my favorite season is winter. i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics. i love cats and have two cats. i've a hat collection of over 1000 hats. i have a weakness for vanilla ice cream.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Friendly and optimistic, but currently navigating through some challenges in his professional life.
participant_2.background: my father is in the army. i love playing softball. i recently was fired and had to get a new job. i work in the insurance business.
